item.title: Need help to add Gfx's to my command
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.source: Need help to add Gfx's to my command

item.title: Need help to add Gfx's to my command
item.dc:creator: @Master_CoderZ Master CoderZ
item.description:
@Master_CoderZ wrote:

Hello ive added a new command to my server ::dice
and i wanted to know how to add the gfxes to look like ur actualy rolling the dice (ive got them)â€¦
PLEASE COMMENT I NEED ALL THE HELP POSSABLY TO GET WORKING 

        [code]
        case 15086: gfx0(2072); break;
        case 15088: gfx0(2074); break;
        case 15090: gfx0(2071); break;
        case 15092: gfx0(2070); break;
        case 15094: gfx0(2073); break;
        case 15096: gfx0(2068); break;
        case 15098: gfx0(2075); break;
        case 15100: gfx0(2069); break;
        [/code]

Heres my dice command

if (playerCommand.startsWith("dice") && c.sit == false) { if(c.inWild()) { c.sendMessage("Er, it's not to smart to do this in the Wilderness."); return; } c.sit = false; if(c.playerRights == 0) { c.forcedText = "I'm Not A Donor+, So, I Can't Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("You must be a donor or a mod to dice!!!!"); } if(c.playerRights == 2) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("Administrator"); } if(c.playerRights == 3) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("Owner"); } if(c.playerRights == 1) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("Moderator"); } if(c.isDonator >= 1) { c.forcedText = "["+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +"] Just Rolled "+ Misc.random(100) +" On The Dice!"; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; c.sendMessage("Donator"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help to add Gfx's to my command
